sentence.Network_en: Accentuate the word " accent " on the first syllable.
sentence.Network_cn: 在 “ accent ” 一词的第一个音节上加重音符号.

sentence.Network_en: Gibberellic acid may also accentuate the trend toward maleness.
sentence.Network_cn: 赤霉酸也可加强雄性的倾向.

sentence.Network_en: Accentuate: Use lip liner after putting on your lipstick . Kiss - able !
sentence.Network_cn: 突出: 涂完 唇膏 以后画唇线,轮廓更突出,更诱人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from medieval Latin accentuat- 'accented', from the verb accentuare, from accentus 'tone' (see accent)

entry.def: To accentuate something means to emphasize it or make it more noticeable.

example.ex: His shaven head accentuates his large round face...
example.tran: 光头使他的大圆脸更加突出。

example.ex: The whole air of menace was accentuated by the fact that he was so cordial and soft-voiced.
example.tran: 他如此亲切，说话轻声细语，这更加重了威胁的语气。

means.word_mean: 1. to stress, single out as important;

sentences.sentence: "Dr. Jones emphasizes exercise in addition to a change in diet"

means.word_mean: 2. put stress on; utter with an accent;

sentences.sentence: "In Farsi, you accent the last syllable of each word"

auth_sentence.content: Eyes are heavily lined in black make-up to accentuate their movements.
auth_sentence.res_content: Eyes are heavily lined in black make-up to accentuate their movements.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Eyes are heavily lined in black make-up to accentuate their movements.

auth_sentence.content: Such an outlook also tends to accentuate a China-centric view of the world.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such an outlook also tends to accentuate a China-centric view of the world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such an outlook also tends to accentuate a China-centric view of the world.

auth_sentence.content: Though there are undoubtedly passages which border on the garish, these only serve to accentuate the toned-down segments.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Though there are undoubtedly passages which border on the garish, these only serve to accentuate the toned-down segments.

stems_affixes.word_buile: cent百,百分之一+enn年+ial表形容词→百年纪念[的]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 百岁或逾百岁以上的[人]
stems_affixes.word_buile: cent百,百分之一+en=enn年+arian人→百岁的人
cent百,百分之一→n.[货币单位]分, 分币;百
cent百,百分之一+enn年+ial表形容词→百年纪念[的]
cent百,百分之一+ury→n.世纪,[一]百年
per每+cent百,百分之一→每一百→百分之
ac加强,一再+cent唱→着重唱→重音
in进入+cent唱+ive→把[力量]唱进去→激励
accent[[n.口音;重音]]匾?uate=ate表动词→强调

sentences.en: The dark frame accentuates the brightness of the picture.
sentences.cn: 深色画框更显出画的明亮色彩。

sentences.en: Her short hair accentuated her eyes.
sentences.cn: 短发使她的大眼睛更加突出。

sentences.en: Accentuate the word“accent”on the first syllable.
sentences.cn: 在“accent”一词的第一个音节上加重音符号。

sentences.en: The problem is accentuated by a shortage of water and electricity.
sentences.cn: 缺乏水电使问题愈加严重。
